## Dataset Setup
```{r}
bigfoot <- read.csv("../data/bigfoot.csv")


# Extracts the year column from date
bigfoot <- bigfoot |> 
  mutate(year = substr(date, 1, 4),
         month = substr(date, 6, 7),
         day = substr(date, 9, 10))


```
